definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: The card shark is caught by the police.
sentences.chinese: 这个老千被警察逮到了。

sentences.english: This kind of thing in coastal areas used more flooding, many in use.
sentences.chinese: 这种东西在沿海地区使用的比较泛滥，很多老千在用。

sentences.english: Now, some people might look down on worm's nechanics, call it immoral.
sentences.chinese: 可能有些人看不起虫子出老千，认为这是不道德的。

sentences.english: Playing 5 card, I found out that besides me, and the 2 is the occupation.
sentences.chinese: 玩上5把牌后，我发现除了我，还有2个是职业老千。

sentences.english: A card shark is a person who wins a card play by cheating other people.
sentences.chinese: 老千就是通过欺骗其他人来赢得扑克游戏的人。

sentences.english: Eventually, after the Gao Ni that learns to be become somewhat gives mountain, began old 1000 career.
sentences.chinese: 终于，学有所成的高尼出山后，开始了老千生涯。

sentences.english: So numerous folk seeing by, may take out old thousand?
sentences.chinese: 这么多人看着，可能抽老千吗？

sentences.english: Is an invitation, to participate in the games, a cheat.
sentences.chinese: 就是别人邀请，参加牌局，在场上出老千嘛。

sentences.english: I am a good luck, how to play so hard to win?
sentences.chinese: 我是一个老千，怎么靠手气打牌那么难赢呢？

definition: (of a villain) to do the dirty on another villain
pai gow (gambling game played with dominoes)
dark road/criminal ways/the underworld/see also 白道[bai2 dao4]
